channel.title: 508 - Anything besides PF and NO-IP? Others Cant Connect?
channel.description: This is my first 508 and other players can't connect is there something besides PortForward and No-Ip to let them on?

item.title: 508 - Anything besides PF and NO-IP? Others Cant Connect?
item.dc:creator: @Qwesterr Qwesterr
item.description:
@Qwesterr wrote:

Maybe for you but I portforwarded wrong. It wouldnt start up. and I fixed portforward and then it worked.

Read full topic
item.source: 508 - Anything besides PF and NO-IP? Others Cant Connect?

item.title: 508 - Anything besides PF and NO-IP? Others Cant Connect?
item.dc:creator: @lolwut44 lolwut44
item.description:
@lolwut44 wrote:

[quote=“Qwesterr, post:8, topic:259164”]Not a 508. If the portforwarding is not done correctly.

Jeremy what is your msn? The little thing doesnt work.[/quote]What are you talking about? I’ve ran a 317, 474, 503 and 508 without an internet connection at my cottage, so you’re wrong.

Read full topic

item.source: 508 - Anything besides PF and NO-IP? Others Cant Connect?

item.title: 508 - Anything besides PF and NO-IP? Others Cant Connect?
item.dc:creator: @lolwut44 lolwut44
item.description:
@lolwut44 wrote:

[quote=“Qwesterr, post:3, topic:259164”]If I didn’t it wouldn’t let me start up the server. So I know I did it correctly.[/quote]You obviously didn’t since you don’t even know what portforwarding does. You don’t have your server starting up on your ip, you’re starting it on localhost. It can work locally without any internet fine, but when others can’t get on it means you didn’t portforward correctly.

Read full topic
